images.description: There are lots of interesting Earthlings out there. Gotta catch 'em all!
Your goal is to collect specific Earthlings as requested by the alien zookeeper.
You earn spacebucks for collecting the right Earthlings, which you can then use to upgrade your ship.

videos.description: A gameplay video for If I Ran the (Alien) Zoo.
